Rulings.Base:
1. If "Fabled Leviathan" is equipped to a monster like "Relinquished" when it is destroyed and sent to the GY, you can activate its effect.
2. If "Fabled Leviathan" is destroyed during the Damage Step, this effect activates at the end of the Damage Step, after it is sent to the GY.
3. This effect targets 1, 2, or 3 "Fabled" monsters.
4. You can select this card itself as one of the targets.
5. If one or more of the targets are not in the GY when this effect resolves, you still add the rest to your hand.
